animals.name: Elephant
animals.interesting_fact: Elephants have the largest brain of any land animal and can recognize themselves in a mirror.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.interesting_fact: Cheetahs are the fastest land animals, reaching speeds of up to 75 mph in short bursts.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.interesting_fact: Penguins can drink salt water, thanks to a special gland that filters out excess salt.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.interesting_fact: Giraffes have the same number of neck vertebrae as humansâ€”seven!

animals.name: Tiger
animals.interesting_fact: Tigers have unique stripe patterns, much like human fingerprints.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.interesting_fact: Kangaroos cannot walk backward due to their strong tail and leg structure.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.interesting_fact: Dolphins use echolocation to find food and navigate their environment.

animals.name: Wolf
animals.interesting_fact: Wolves have complex social structures and communicate through vocalizations and body language.
